title: How can I disconnect from automated assistant ?
content:
When I pick up my Pixel 3 the assistant starts talking and I can not get it to stop. Any button I push the 
assistant says, " Double tap and long hold."  Then when I do the double tap it will not pull up any button I touch. It just keep saying " Double tap and long hold" which is driving me crazy. Has anyone had this problem and can help me fix it ? thanks.
